Sentencas: Rhombohedral Bi2O3 has not been extensively evaluated as an electrolyte material for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) due to the greater potential of the more highly conductive cubic phase.
Titulo: Optimizing rhombohedral Bi2O3 conductivity for low temperature SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: Due to the higher structural stability of rhombohedral Bi2O3, improving the conductivity of the material was undertaken to improve the performance of the electrolyte.
Titulo: Optimizing rhombohedral Bi2O3 conductivity for low temperature SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: Since the rhombohedral phase is generally only assessed in Bi2O3 with high total dopant concentrations, the phase stability window was mapped out in the lower dopant regime.
Titulo: Optimizing rhombohedral Bi2O3 conductivity for low temperature SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: Reported herein is a phase diagram of the rhombohedral Bi2O3 at a total dopant concentration below 10%.
Titulo: Optimizing rhombohedral Bi2O3 conductivity for low temperature SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: Within the phase stability window, the rhombohedral phase was also optimized in terms of the dopant cation and the total cation substitution rate.
Titulo: Optimizing rhombohedral Bi2O3 conductivity for low temperature SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: It was found that increasing the size of the cation dopant and decreasing the total dopant concentration required to stabilize the rhombohedral phase, ultimately maximized the conductivity.
Titulo: Optimizing rhombohedral Bi2O3 conductivity for low temperature SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: Overall, the La and Y double-doped Bi2O3 exhibited a conductivity of 3x10(-2)S/cm at 500 degrees C, which is over three times higher than the conductivity of the more traditional SOFC electrolyte GDC.
Titulo: Optimizing rhombohedral Bi2O3 conductivity for low temperature SOFC electrolytes
